name: Flamnix
description:
An illegal experiment was carried out on Joy. Which gave her the ability to manipulate and create fire. She I the very first mutant in history. After the experiment Shadow labs never released her, she was used as a lab rat to create more mutants.

But one day she discovered the door in her room was never locked. She escaped but was enraged and intoxicated with vengeance. She destroyed the lab but the lead scientist  "Doctor Shadow" escaped in an helicopter.

Your goal is to defeat any obstacle in your path and catch up with the doctor and help joy exert her revenge on him.

You can shoot fireballs from your legs send enemies flying with just one kick. Even kick back missiles and bullets. Power up and keep your energy bar full and defeat Doctor Shadow and end his mutant crusade.

Have fun😁
